title: How to Make a Strawberry and Vanilla Milkshake

methods.name: Making a Real Strawberry and Vanilla Milkshake

steps.headline: Tip half of the strawberries into the blender.
steps.description: Add 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla extract, 1 cup of ice cream and 2 tablespoons of milk.

steps.headline: Serve immediately.
steps.description: Add a straw and perhaps a garnish of a half strawberry.

methods.name: Making a Strawberry and Vanilla Ice Cream Milkshake

steps.headline: Pop the scoops of strawberry and vanilla ice-cream into a blender.
Blend to combine.
steps.description: If the mixture is still too thick, add a little more milk and blend again.

steps.headline: Pour the milkshake mixture into a tall glass.
Serve immediately.
steps.description: Garnish with a mint leaf or a sprinkle of nutmeg (optional).

methods.name: Making a Strawberry Shortcake and Vanilla Milkshake

steps.headline: Prepare the glasses.
steps.description: Dip the rim of each glass in honey or maple syrup.

steps.headline: Dip in the crushed graham crackers to coat the rimmed area of each glass.
Drop the crumbled pound cake, vanilla ice cream and strawberries into the blender.
Blend to combine and form a smooth milkshake.
Pour the milkshake carefully into the glasses.
steps.description: Take care to not knock off the rimmed crushed crackers.

steps.headline: Serve immediately.
steps.description: Give each person a tall spoon.

text: Making a Real Strawberry and Vanilla Milkshake Tip half of the strawberries into the blender. Add 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla extract, 1 cup of ice cream and 2 tablespoons of milk. Blend until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses. Repeat using the remaining ingredients. Pour into another 2 glasses. Serve immediately. Add a straw and perhaps a garnish of a half strawberry. Making a Strawberry and Vanilla Ice Cream Milkshake Pop the scoops of strawberry and vanilla ice-cream into a blender. Add a little milk. Blend to combine. If the mixture is still too thick, add a little more milk and blend again. Pour the milkshake mixture into a tall glass.  Serve immediately. Garnish with a mint leaf or a sprinkle of nutmeg (optional). Making a Strawberry Shortcake and Vanilla Milkshake Prepare the glasses. Dip the rim of each glass in honey or maple syrup. Dip in the crushed graham crackers to coat the rimmed area of each glass.  Drop the crumbled pound cake, vanilla ice cream and strawberries into the blender.  Blend to combine and form a smooth milkshake.  Pour the milkshake carefully into the glasses. Take care to not knock off the rimmed crushed crackers. Serve immediately. Give each person a tall spoon.
